title: enagoppa doreyu
sahitya:
enagoppa doreyu dorakidanu


anupallavi

  vanaja sambhava janaka hanumantaryAmi


caraNam 1    mAta pitanAda bhrAtru bAndhavanAda prItiyindali tAne nAthanAda 
khyAtanu tAnAda dAtanu tAnAda  bhUtEsha vandya vibhUti priyanAda
    caraNam 2    shanka cakrAnkitada sankaruSaNanAda binkadim birudugaLa pottavanAda 
pankaja nayana mInAnka janakanAda OmkAra mUruti purandara viTTalanAda
